description: Mike's Schwarz II 1998 E36 M3 Sedan — a US-spec manual built for both journalism and spirited driving, featuring Boa Boa Recaro seats in black/blue, Euro-style amber turn signals, and classic BBS LM wheels.
John's Titanium Silver E36 M3, powered by the US-spec S52 engine. Owned and meticulously maintained for over 11 years as a true OEM+ daily driver.

description: 1 of 33 Chiaretto Red E39 525i in Sweden. Rare color, clean condition, and well-maintained. Driven daily with pride.

This E46 isn’t just a car, it’s a family member. With nearly 20 years of ownership, almost 300k miles on the odometer, M54B30/6 speed swaps & more, it’s been through many phases of life, and I hope it stays with me for many more.
